mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications(USER_ID_NO, MESSAGE, type) VALUES (#{userIdNo}, #{message}, #{type})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE NOTIFICATIONS_ID IN (SELECT tmp.NOTIFICATIONS_ID FROM (SELECT NOTIFICATIONS_ID FROM Notifications WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} ORDER BY NOTIFICATIONS_CREATED_AT ASC LIMIT ${delCount}) tmp)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}
